email_preview.subject_a: Sarah, what outreach_followers isn't showing you
email_preview.body:
Hi Sarah,

I noticed you follow outreach_followers's updates on LinkedIn - smart move staying current on revenue intelligence.

Here's what I've been hearing from VP of Revenue Operationss like yourself at companies your size:

"outreach_followers shows us what happened... but we still can't predict what's going to happen next quarter."

At Chiefaiofficer.com, we're building the layer ABOVE traditional tools.

Worth a 15-min look?

Best,
Chris...

semantic_anchors: TEMPLATE: competitor_displacement - Default template - no specific source match
PERSONALIZATION: deep depth using hooks: company_size_messaging, industry_specific_content, leadership_value_props
A/B TEST: Subject A (pain point) vs Subject B (transformation) - expect A higher open rate
REVIEW: AE approval required for 2 leads
